description.narrative: The strategic objective is, by various means of advocacy, to reach and influence key decision-makers, and promote the uptake of data-driven recommendations on policies and investments related to gender equality in key international NGOs, UN Agencies and countries, with the aim to accelerate progress towards improving the health and rights of women and girl globally and in developing countries. The objective will be achieved through 1) communication and advocacy materials developed and disseminated in Kenya and globally that contribute to shifting the narrative to prioritize gender equality and girls and women’s health and rights, 2) Technical support on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response and recovery, provided to UN agencies and through Women Deliver participation on key task forces and initiatives, and 3) Support to networks of advocates, in order to push for progress on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including in the COVID-19 response and recovery, globally and in Kenya.

title.narrative: Output 1.1: Communication and advocacy materials developed and disseminated globally and in Kenya that contribute to shifting the narrative to prioritize gender equality and girls

description.narrative:
Indicator 1.1.1: # of communication and advocacy materials developed and/or updated (SRHR to be captured) Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 40
Indicator 1.1.2: # of Deliver for Good partners, allies, and influencers receiving the Communication and Social Media toolkits Baseline: 66 per month Target 2020: 66 per month
Indicator 1.1.3: # of downloads of Deliver for Good updated briefs and infographics Baseline: 500 per year Target 2020: 1000 per year (500 new downloads)
Indicator 1.1.4: # of key policy and advocacy messages that promote a gender lens for Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) monitoring and accountability for use by Deliver for Good allies and partners (globally and in Kenya) Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 2

title.narrative: Output 1.2: Technical support on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response and recovery, provided to UN agencies and through Women Deliver participation on key task forces and initiatives

description.narrative:
Indicator 1.2.1: # of key initiatives, partnerships, coalitions, and taskforces in which Women Deliver participates, where technical support on gender equality, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response/recovery is provided Baseline: 15 Target 2020: 15
Indicator 1.2.2: # of advisory roles (formal and informal) to bilaterals, multilaterals, UN agencies, global partnerships, corporate, and civil society entities, where technical support on gender equality, including SRHR and the COVID-19 response/recovery is provided Baseline: 10 Target 2020: 10

title.narrative: Output 1.3: Networks of advocates supported to engage in key advocacy moments to push for progress on gender equality and girls’ and women’s health and rights, including in the COVID-19 response and recovery, globally and in Kenya

description.narrative:
POLICY & ADVOCACY Indicator 1.3.1: # and type of strategic input provided to the Alliance for Gender Equality and UHC in the context of COVID-19 response and recovery (COVID-19 to be captured) Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 4
Indicator 1.3.2: # and type of webinars (COVID-19 to be captured) Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 2
Indicator 1.3.3: # of people who participated in webinar (f/m) Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 30
DELIVER FOR GOOD GLOBAL Indicator 1.3.4: # of convenings for Advisory Group to develop Deliver for Good global campaign action plan for 2020, in the context of COVID-19 Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 2 virtual convenings
Indicator 1.3.5: # of Deliver for Good workgroup meetings to implement the global action plan for 2020, in the context of COVID-19 Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 3 virtual workgroup meetings
DELIVER FOR GOOD KENYA Indicator 1.3.6: # and type of technical assistance (TA) provided to Deliver for GoodKenya coalition for the development and execution of the 2020 workplan, in the context of COVID-19 Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 8 TA calls
Indicator 1.3.7: # of Kenya delegates supported to access advocacy platforms Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 2
Indicator 1.3.8: # of Kenya delegates supported to access Generation Equality Forum events Baseline: 0 Target 2020: 1
